creator: adelmelle@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 22196
fo file demonstrating issues

See the attachments:

The height of the absolute-positioned block-container seems to be added to the outer block-container's height, which I suspect is wrong. The outer block-container's height should probably be the maximum of the block's height and the inner block-container's height, not the sum.

Created attachment 22197
PDF output showing the problem
creator: adelmelle@apache.org
adelmelle@apache.org
text: Additionally, but I'm not sure if that is incorrect behavior, I would expect the absolute-positioned block-container's 100% bpd to evaluate to the block's accumulated bpd... (?)

creator: adelmelle@apache.org
text: Confirmed fixed in latest FOP Trunk, after http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=707631&view=rev

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
